disclaimer.initial: Disclaimer: I am not a certified architect. This design is for informational purposes only and should be verified with professional advice.
disclaimer.final: Disclaimer: Always consult a certified architect before implementing any design changes.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen and living area, Scandinavian style, wheelchair accessible with wider doorways and no step transitions. Incorporates ample natural lighting and minimalistic design elements.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed for quiet work with integrated storage, ergonomic design following Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu guidelines to promote productivity.

rooms.name: Guest Room/Study
rooms.description: Multi-functional space serving as a guest room or study, designed with Scandinavian minimalism and flexible furniture arrangements, wheelchair accessible.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with wide door openings, leading directly into the living area. Uses durable Scandinavian materials and meets local building norms.

openings.name: Kitchen Access
openings.description: Direct access to the open-plan kitchen from the living area for seamless workflow.

openings.name: Office Entrance
openings.description: Accessible door leading to the dedicated home office space, meeting accessibility standards.

openings.name: Garden Access
openings.description: Door from living area leading outdoors into a large garden designed for relaxation and additional wheelchair accessible pathways.
